content.prompt: Which of the following questions will best guide a follow-up investigation about the role of pheromones in locating prey?

choices.label: How do pike determine that the fathead minnow pheromone is present in the water?
Why do pike prey on fathead minnows?
Do pike have natural predators in the environment?
Do pike release pheromones that are detected by fathead minnows?

skill.text: 3.A: Identify or pose a testable question based on an observation, data, or a model.
